import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listLots } from '../actions/lotActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import Lot from '../components/Lot' import Paginate from '../components/Paginate' function LotListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const lotList = useSelector(state => state.lotList) const {loading, error, lots, page, count} = lotList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listLots()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Lots

{loading ? : error ? {error} : lots.length === 0 ? No Lots :
{lots.map(lot => ( ))}
}
) } export default LotListScreen
